Judul: TEMPO in Chemical Transformations: From Homogeneous to Heterogeneous
Abstrak: The organic nitroxyl radical, TEMPO (2,2,6,6-tetramethylpiperidine-Noxyl), finds a variety of industrial applications for chemical transformations. Because of economic and environmental concerns, the recovery and reuse of TEMPO with maintained high activity are of the utmost importance....
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Qi Zhang, Kecheng Hu, Li Zhu, Jianli Wang, Zhibin Ye
Kata Kunci: TEMPO, immobilization, recovery, chemical transformations, catalysis, applications
